feed.title: Minio Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Minio: RELEASE.2024-07-15T19-02-30Z
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: typo in BucketUsageMetrics group registration in v3 metrics by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20090
  • Removed user and group details from logs by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20072
  • add validation test for v3 metrics for all its endpoints by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20094
  • Split handleMessages (cosmetic) by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20095

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-07-13T01-46-15Z...RELEASE.2024-07-15T19-02-30Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: RELEASE.2024-07-16T23-46-41Z
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow a KMS Action to specify keys in the Resources of a policy by @marktheunissen in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20079
  • Update reedsolomon dependency with fix for Graviton4 processor by @fwessels in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20102
  • replication: proxy only on missing object or read quorum err by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20101

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-07-15T19-02-30Z...RELEASE.2024-07-16T23-46-41Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • batch-expiry: Save progress regularly in the drives and at the end by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20098
  • s3: Fix wrong continuation token during listing with ILM enabled bucket by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20113
  • do not set KMSSecretKey env from KMSSecretKeyFile by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20122
  • remove unnecessary LRU for internode auth token by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20119
  • fix: Use xtime duration to parse batch job by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20117
  • fips: enforce FIPS-compliant TLS ciphers in FIPS mode by @aead in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20131
  • Tweak grid for less writes by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20129
  • add optimizations to bring performance on unversioned READS by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20128
  • Set O_NONBLOCK for reads and writes on unix by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20133
  • Fix updateGroupMembershipsForLDAP behavior with unicode by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20137
  • avoid sendFile() for ranges or object lengths < 4MiB by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20141
  • use unixNanoTime instead of time.Time in lockRequestorInfo by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20140
  • grafana: Fix the unit in Open FDs panel by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20144
  • kms: Expose API when bucket federation is enabled by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20143
  • SNMD: Properly reload a fresh drive when found in a failed state during startup by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20145
  • Different read quorum for tiered objects by @krisis in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20115
  • Expose RPC reconnections and ping time by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20157
  • move to GET for internal stream READs instead of POST by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20160
  • Avoid Batch Replication Job log spam by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20158
  • fix: check once ready for site-replication by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20149
  • remove fdatasync() discard, we write with O_SYNC by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20168
  • Update connection deadlines less frequently by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20166
  • fix panic in replication queuing by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20169

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-07-16T23-46-41Z...RELEASE.2024-07-26T20-48-21Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: support prefix when batchJob replicatate enable the snowball by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20178
  • change Read* calls over net/http to move to http.MethodGet by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20173
  • fix replication of checksum when encryption is enabled by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20161
  • separate lock from common grid to avoid epoll contention by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20180
  • Restructure metrics v3 readme for docs use by @feorlen in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20114
  • remove replication throttle deadline for objects > 128MiB by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20184

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-07-26T20-48-21Z...RELEASE.2024-07-29T22-14-52Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add DeleteBulk support, add sufficient deadlines per rename() by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20185
  • allow multipart uploads expiration to be dynamic by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20190
  • Fix v2 metrics: Send all ttfb api labels by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20191
  • Add fmt-gen subcommand by @krisis in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20192
  • count metrics properly for any failures during drive heal by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20193

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-07-29T22-14-52Z...RELEASE.2024-07-31T05-46-26Z
